name: Shadhavar
movement: fast with a walking speed of 50 feet
description: The Shadhavar is a large monstrosity with a hollow horn and hooves, embodying both elegance and threat.
memorable: Its ability to create a magical darkness that cannot be pierced by darkvision makes it a formidable opponent.
goals: To isolate and incapacitate foes using its charm and darkness abilities.
relations: Could be found with other stealthy or darkness-themed creatures.
environment: Often encountered in dark or enchanted forests.
strengths: Good stealth ability and the power to charm enemies, drastically altering battle dynamics.
weaknesses: Low intelligence, making it less strategic in complex scenarios.
attacks: Utilizes Gore and Hooves melee attacks, dealing piercing and bludgeoning damage respectively.
most_powerful_ability: Darkness Aura creates magical darkness that negates darkvision, providing tactical advantage.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet but can see through magical darkness.
skills: Has a proficient Stealth skill, allowing it to remain undetected effectively.
additional_information: Magic Horn makes Gore attacks magical, bypassing defenses against non-magical attacks.
Shadesight ability allows it to see normally in magical darkness.
Can charm multiple foes within range with its Plaintive Melody ability.
Creates a thick magical darkness that moves with it, persisting for up to 10 minutes.
Has an impressive mobility with a walking speed of 50 feet.
test_queries: large creature with a magical horn
stealthy monster that creates magical darkness
creature with a captivating melody and hooves
fast monstrosity that excels in subterfuge
